description: Metric published about sampled service requests showing request status and latencies
title: io.nats.server.metric.v1.service_latency

acc.description: The account the client belongs to

rtt.description: The latency between the client and the server

start.description: The time this client connected to the server, in RFC3339 format

user.description: The username of the connected client

name.description: The connection name declared while connecting

lang.description: The language the client is programmed in

ver.description: The version of the client library

ip.description: The IP address the client is connecting from

cid.description: The unique client ID assigned by the server

server.description: The server name where the client is connected

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

header.description: When header based latency is enabled, the headers that triggered the event

status.description: The status of the request. 200 OK, 400 Bad Request, no reply subject. 408 Request Timeout, requester lost interest before request completed. 503 Service Unavailable. 504 Service Timeout.

error.description: A description of the status code when not 200

start.description: The time the request started in RFC3339 format

service.description: The time taken by the service to perform the request in nanoseconds

system.description: Time spend traversing the NATS network in nanoseconds

total.description: The overall request duration in nanoseconds
